9a187721-0588-4f3c-ba9c-bff4989001b9.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: A member of the chaotic evil fiends native to the Abyss.
9a187721-0588-4f3c-ba9c-bff4989001b9.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Un membre des fiélons d'alignement chaotique mauvais originaires des Abysses.

9a92ac6d-b7cc-4ccb-8965-074c6b36a342.Name: REALLY_HILLDWARF
9a92ac6d-b7cc-4ccb-8965-074c6b36a342.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Hill dwarves are defined by their keen intuition and heightened senses. Their resilience has kept a massive kingdom in the south intact for centuries.
9a92ac6d-b7cc-4ccb-8965-074c6b36a342.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Les nains des collines se caractérisent par leur remarquable intuition et leurs sens surdéveloppés. Leur résistance naturelle leur a permis de préserver des siècles durant l'intégrité de leur vaste royaume du sud.

9b6f9531-c2d3-47b2-9153-861425152eb3.Name: VFX_KNOCK_SMALL
9b6f9531-c2d3-47b2-9153-861425152eb3.Description: Knock spell VFX for small objects

9be69f6b-a5a9-4b84-ad7e-cd3a420fb81f.Name: CONTROL_UNDEAD_IMMUNE
9be69f6b-a5a9-4b84-ad7e-cd3a420fb81f.Description: Tag used to give immunity against control undead to some characters.

9c38904c-4aed-4d22-9038-fc7d103aaed5.Name: FOLKHERO
9c38904c-4aed-4d22-9038-fc7d103aaed5.Description: |You have humble beginnings, but are destined for so much more. Already the people of your home village regard you as their champion, and your destiny calls you to stand against the tyrants and monsters that threaten the common folk everywhere.|
9c38904c-4aed-4d22-9038-fc7d103aaed5.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: You're a champion of the common people, challenging tyrants and monsters to protect the helpless. Saving people in imminent danger will make your legend grow.
9c38904c-4aed-4d22-9038-fc7d103aaed5.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Prenant inlassablement le parti des petites gens, vous n'hésitez pas à affronter les tyrans et monstres de tout poil pour défendre la veuve et l'orphelin. Sauver les gens en danger ne peut que faire grandir votre légende.

9c79bbd4-c01c-4894-a2cf-51e1aae09a90.Name: SPECTATOR
9c79bbd4-c01c-4894-a2cf-51e1aae09a90.Description: A combat tag allowing the petrified drow, around the spectator, to cast healing spells on him, and only on him

9cefcf81-6c03-4505-96e1-9de55c8ab647.Name: RETREAT
9cefcf81-6c03-4505-96e1-9de55c8ab647.Description: AI hint tag for trigger, Indicies interesting area for retreating

9d0fd44c-2495-44db-a184-4ca824832f3e.Name: VFX_BLOOD_SILVER
9d0fd44c-2495-44db-a184-4ca824832f3e.Description: Tag to identify creatures with Silver blood for VFX

9f6bb135-01f1-4b7d-80d3-50bab725728c.Name: PALADIN_GARLGLITTERGOLD
9f6bb135-01f1-4b7d-80d3-50bab725728c.Description: Player or NPC is a paladin of Garl Glittergold.
9f6bb135-01f1-4b7d-80d3-50bab725728c.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: The Watchful Protector is the king of gnomish gods - a deity of humour, gem-cutting, protection, and trickery.
9f6bb135-01f1-4b7d-80d3-50bab725728c.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Le Protecteur Vigilant est le plus grand dieu du panthéon gnome. Ses sphères d'influence sont l'humour, la taille de gemmes, la protection et la fourberie.

9fbbedb6-c485-4c6b-94b7-c7d7592223b3.Name: CLERIC_OGHMA
9fbbedb6-c485-4c6b-94b7-c7d7592223b3.Description: Player or NPC is cleric of Oghma.
9fbbedb6-c485-4c6b-94b7-c7d7592223b3.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Oghma is the Lord of Knowledge, overseeing inspiration and invention. His clerics spread truth, encourage innovation, and stamp out falsehoods wherever they go.
9fbbedb6-c485-4c6b-94b7-c7d7592223b3.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Seigneur de la Connaissance, Oghma préside à l'inspiration et à l'invention. Ses clercs sont les chantres de la vérité et encouragent l'innovation, tout en battant en brèche le mensonge où qu'ils aillent.

a01efcc1-9e2f-4438-956b-b448cbf73bde.Name: CLERIC_KELEMVOR
a01efcc1-9e2f-4438-956b-b448cbf73bde.Description: Player or NPC is cleric of Kelemvor.
a01efcc1-9e2f-4438-956b-b448cbf73bde.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Kelemvor is the fair-minded judge of the dead, shepherding lost souls to the afterlife. His clerics perform burial rites and punish those who unnaturally extend their lifespans, such as liches and vampires.
a01efcc1-9e2f-4438-956b-b448cbf73bde.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Juge impartial des morts, Kelemvor guide les âmes défuntes vers l'au-delà. Les membres de son clergé veillent au respect des rites funéraires et châtient ceux qui prolongent leur vie de façon artificielle, comme les liches et les vampires.

a171ef78-79b3-4512-a648-ca28fe06f60b.Name: VFX_BLOOD_ACID
a171ef78-79b3-4512-a648-ca28fe06f60b.Description: Tag to identify creatures with Acid blood for VFX

a3a713b6-f06a-401d-a5e5-0b878fdb472e.Name: VFX_MOONLANTERN_POLE
a3a713b6-f06a-401d-a5e5-0b878fdb472e.Description: Pole version of the moon lantern

a3b7a422-4d28-413d-adc4-e7d2001e37f5.Name: SORCERER_WILD_MAGIC_SUPRESSED
a3b7a422-4d28-413d-adc4-e7d2001e37f5.Description: Character with this tag cannot trigger wild magic

a49c94ac-6903-408e-8b05-86371fd865c0.Name: BLINDSIGHT
a49c94ac-6903-408e-8b05-86371fd865c0.Description: |Applied by the Bind Sight Passive. A monster with blindsight can perceive its surroundings without relying on sight, within a specific radius.|

a50cb0b1-29a6-4711-a71d-0dc3e3642287.Name: IGNORE_CHASMS
a50cb0b1-29a6-4711-a71d-0dc3e3642287.Description: Characters and items with this tag will not be affected by chasms (no "enter" event to script, no destruction or teleportation of the object, ...)

a672ac1d-d088-451a-9537-3da4bf74466c.Name: DROWELF
a672ac1d-d088-451a-9537-3da4bf74466c.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: The elves of the Underdark, drow have been fighting a massive civil war since the goddess Lolth severed herself from the elvish pantheon, a betrayal scarring every generation that followed. Drow city-states struggle with one another for dominance, but the true war is between the cultists who serve Lolth and those who resist the goddess' corruption.
a672ac1d-d088-451a-9537-3da4bf74466c.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Les drows sont les elfes des Tréfonds Obscurs. Ils livrent une terrible guerre civile depuis que leur déesse, Lolth, a décidé de faire sécession du reste du panthéon elfique. Les cités-États des drows sont en lutte permanente pour tenter d'imposer leur volonté à leurs voisines, mais ce n'est rien pas rapport au conflit qui oppose les fidèles de Lolth à ceux qui refusent la corruption de la déesse.

a8139e1a-c593-4e0b-88cd-f703f888db83.Name: TORCH
a8139e1a-c593-4e0b-88cd-f703f888db83.Description: Tag for setting Status VFX overrides.

aa9f126f-ac9a-48d9-a128-1394fae8f4e8.Name: CLERIC_EVIL
aa9f126f-ac9a-48d9-a128-1394fae8f4e8.Description: Player is a cleric of an evil-aligned deity
aa9f126f-ac9a-48d9-a128-1394fae8f4e8.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Evil clerics are driven to conquer and corrupt Faerûn in service to their gods. Shar, Bhaal, Bane, and Myrkul are common gods they worship.
aa9f126f-ac9a-48d9-a128-1394fae8f4e8.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Les clercs d'alignement mauvais sont prêts à tout pour conquérir et corrompre Faerûn au service de leurs dieux, parmi lesquels figurent notamment Shar, Bhaal, Baine et Myrkul.

aaef5d43-c6f3-434d-b11e-c763290dbe0c.Name: TIEFLING
aaef5d43-c6f3-434d-b11e-c763290dbe0c.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Descended from devils of the Nine Hells - by blood or curse - tieflings face constant suspicion in Faerûn. Their arcane abilities make them natural survivors, whether as heroes or villains.
aaef5d43-c6f3-434d-b11e-c763290dbe0c.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Descendants des diables des Neuf Enfers, par le sang ou en vertu d'une malédiction, les tieffelins font l'objet d'une défiance constante à Faerûn. Par chance, leurs facultés occultes en font des experts de la survie, héros et scélérats confondus.

ab677895-e08a-479f-a043-eac2d8447188.Name: ZARIELTIEFLING
ab677895-e08a-479f-a043-eac2d8447188.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Tieflings from Zariel's bloodline are empowered with martial strength, and can channel searing flame to punish their enemies.
ab677895-e08a-479f-a043-eac2d8447188.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Les tieffelins de la lignée de Zariel possèdent une force hors du commun et ont la possibilité de faire apparaître des flammes pour incinérer leurs ennemis.

abadcad5-9229-4999-8c7a-cd557ff2c95c.Name: METAL
abadcad5-9229-4999-8c7a-cd557ff2c95c.Description: Used to determine whether item is made of metal for purpose of spell targeting.

ac3449f7-c09b-4bc0-8634-fcff97d49279.Name: BERSERKER
ac3449f7-c09b-4bc0-8634-fcff97d49279.Description: A supplimentary Berserker tag for more primal lines.
ac3449f7-c09b-4bc0-8634-fcff97d49279.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Violence is both a means and an end. You follow a path of untrammelled fury, slick with blood, as you thrill in the chaos of battle, heedless of your own well-being.
ac3449f7-c09b-4bc0-8634-fcff97d49279.DisplayDescriptionFrench: La violence est à la fois un moyen d'atteindre ses fins, ainsi qu'une fin en soi. La voie que vous suivez est celle du sang et de la fureur, car rien ne vous plaît plus que de vous précipiter au cœur du chaos du combat, sans aucune considération pour votre sécurité.

ad129444-0f41-4114-9ee5-2b9902d7ca8d.Name: REALLY_DWARF
ad129444-0f41-4114-9ee5-2b9902d7ca8d.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Durable and unyielding as their homes of stone, dwarves are some of the finest warriors, miners, and smiths of Faerûn.
ad129444-0f41-4114-9ee5-2b9902d7ca8d.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Aussi robustes et inébranlables que leurs maisons de pierre, les nains figurent parmi les meilleurs guerriers, mineurs et forgerons de Faerûn.

ad247b59-d101-4f04-99ef-471c65678662.Name: TELEPATHY
ad247b59-d101-4f04-99ef-471c65678662.Description: For Dialog lines that are marked a Telephaty Internal Speech
ad247b59-d101-4f04-99ef-471c65678662.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: The famed Blade of Frontiers, the pride of Baldur's Gate.
ad247b59-d101-4f04-99ef-471c65678662.DisplayDescriptionFrench: La célèbre Épée des Confins, fierté de la Porte de Baldur.

ada75891-25ff-4bdc-9a11-ad32de62a961.Name: CHARMED_ADV
ada75891-25ff-4bdc-9a11-ad32de62a961.Description: Advantage on rolls against charm statuses

adb71c5b-0f7d-44bf-9d34-6912d014578a.Name: COMBAT_FORMATIONTACTICS
adb71c5b-0f7d-44bf-9d34-6912d014578a.Description: This tag will govern who can benefit from Formation Tactics (Guards, Flaming Fist...)

b03d4a89-bba7-45a4-a89d-a132ddd75637.Name: CLERIC_BHAAL
b03d4a89-bba7-45a4-a89d-a132ddd75637.Description: Player or NPC is cleric of Bhaal.
b03d4a89-bba7-45a4-a89d-a132ddd75637.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Bhaal is the notorious god of murder. He once spread his heritage and sadistic impulses through all of Faerûn, then resurrected himself in a horrific ritual. His clerics are assassins, deliberately killing to honour their god.
b03d4a89-bba7-45a4-a89d-a132ddd75637.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Dieu du Meurtre, Bhaal propageait autrefois son héritage et ses pulsions sadiques à travers l'ensemble de Faerûn. Un temps remplacé par Cyric, il a fini par ressusciter grâce à un effroyable rituel. Son clergé est composé d'assassins qui tuent délibérément pour rendre hommage à leur maître.

b0401c02-70b3-47f5-998f-8d440ad6954f.Name: REALLY_FORESTGNOME
b0401c02-70b3-47f5-998f-8d440ad6954f.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Even smaller than their cousins and twice as reclusive, forest gnomes are a rare sight in Faerûn. They master magic and craftsmanship in their distant, idyllic groves.
b0401c02-70b3-47f5-998f-8d440ad6954f.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Encore plus petits et solitaires que leurs cousins, les gnomes des forêts se montrent très rarement. Magiciens et artisans experts, ils vivent reclus dans leurs bosquets idylliques, isolés dans les confins de Faerûn.

b0cf1015-6367-4f54-82ef-92cd9df72590.Name: KNOCK_TARGET
b0cf1015-6367-4f54-82ef-92cd9df72590.Description: |The object is targetable by the Knock spell, even if it's not systemically locked.|

b12e8dff-c1f0-4e9c-9ec0-1cafd22bb637.Name: REALLY_WOODELF
b12e8dff-c1f0-4e9c-9ec0-1cafd22bb637.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Reclusive and wise, wood elves are primarily found in the forests of Faerûn. Rigorous training makes them masters of archery and camouflage, enhanced by an otherworldly swiftness.
b12e8dff-c1f0-4e9c-9ec0-1cafd22bb637.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Connus pour leur sagesse, les elfes des bois, ou elfes sylvestres, vivent pour la plupart reclus dans les forêts de Faerûn. Forts de leur rigoureux entraînement au tir à l'arc, ces maîtres du camouflage bénéficient également d'une vivacité surnaturelle.

b148cfca-53d8-4b73-b052-de08394a235e.Name: SHOPTRIGGER_FOR_SALE
b148cfca-53d8-4b73-b052-de08394a235e.Description: |Set on roots that should be for sale by default in shop triggers. E.g. weapons, armor, ...|

b438b4e8-fb16-4202-b338-17d2d874c2c1.Name: PALADIN_EILISTRAEE
b438b4e8-fb16-4202-b338-17d2d874c2c1.Description: Player is a paladin of EIlistraee.
b438b4e8-fb16-4202-b338-17d2d874c2c1.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Eilistraee is a drow god of moonlight, song, swordwork and dance. Her paladins are tasked with coaxing other drow away from evil, and hunting the demonic agents of Lolth.
b438b4e8-fb16-4202-b338-17d2d874c2c1.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Eilistraée est la déesse drow du clair de lune, de la musique, de l'escrime et de la danse. Ses paladins ont pour mission de détourner leurs congénères des forces du mal et de traquer sans relâche les agents démoniaques à la solde de Lolth.

b451184e-bb49-450e-9e77-d82d0e20a5e7.Name: VFX_KNOCK_LARGE
b451184e-bb49-450e-9e77-d82d0e20a5e7.Description: Knock spell VFX for large objects

b5825091-f2ed-4657-8d86-c0d020c358a0.Name: PALADIN_BLOCK_OATHBREAK
b5825091-f2ed-4657-8d86-c0d020c358a0.Description: |Used to avoid paladins from breaking their oaths if they do something that it would against the entity with this tag.|

b7018e56-3185-4dde-8605-48bd9e782969.Name: CHASM_IMMUNE_SWIM
b7018e56-3185-4dde-8605-48bd9e782969.Description: Upon entering a chasm tagged with DEEP_WATER_CHASM, will be returned to the nearest valid position without dying.

b8aec881-85fe-4e6e-8a28-7052ecd88899.Name: PALADIN_TYR
b8aec881-85fe-4e6e-8a28-7052ecd88899.Description: Player or NPC is a paladin of Tyr.
b8aec881-85fe-4e6e-8a28-7052ecd88899.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Tyr is the god of justice, and his paladins are the sword that enforces this justice. They constantly hunt monsters and other wicked beings, for none may escape the Maimed God's sight.
b8aec881-85fe-4e6e-8a28-7052ecd88899.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Tyr est le dieu de la justice, dont ses paladins incarnent le bras armé. Ils traquent sans relâche les monstres et autres créatures maléfiques, car nul n'échappe à la vigilance du Dieu Manchot.

b99b6a5d-8445-44e4-ac58-81b2ee88aab1.Name: HALFLING
b99b6a5d-8445-44e4-ac58-81b2ee88aab1.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Small yet capable, halflings prefer the comforts of home and hearth - but their natural luck and dexterity makes them fine adventurers.
b99b6a5d-8445-44e4-ac58-81b2ee88aab1.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Petits mais débrouillards, les halfelins sont plutôt casaniers, mais leur chance et leur dextérité naturelles en font des aventuriers tout à fait capables.

b9e63705-637a-4d3b-87ef-a49324cf703f.Name: PERMA_DEFEATED_OR_OFFSTAGE
b9e63705-637a-4d3b-87ef-a49324cf703f.Description: Set on characters that are either perma-defeated or offstage (for use with queries to remove red outlines from items and corpses)

baf9fb0e-f535-40a0-bb78-3ec289d84e66.Name: GUILD_ARTISAN
baf9fb0e-f535-40a0-bb78-3ec289d84e66.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Your skill in a particular craft has earned you membership in a mercantile guild, offering privileges and protection while engaging in your art. Discovering rare components for wondrous crafts will provide the perfect muse.
baf9fb0e-f535-40a0-bb78-3ec289d84e66.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Votre compétence dans une forme d'artisanat spécifique vous a permis d'intégrer une guilde marchande, laquelle vous offre privilèges et protection pendant que vous pratiquez votre art. Découvrir les ingrédients rares servant à fabriquer des objets hors du commun est la plus grande des motivations à vos yeux.

bb7c731c-7af7-4c2d-b3d7-b4e8bd86a244.Name: REALLY_HIGHHALFELF
bb7c731c-7af7-4c2d-b3d7-b4e8bd86a244.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: A step further from the Feywild than their high elf parent, these half-elves still hold a magical spark. They mature faster than their brethren, but only live a few decades longer than humans.
bb7c731c-7af7-4c2d-b3d7-b4e8bd86a244.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Bien que leurs liens avec la Féérie sauvage soient plus ténus que ceux de leur parent haut-elfe, ces demi-elfes possèdent toujours quelques bribes de pouvoir magique. Ils vieillissent plus vite que leurs frères et ne vivent que quelques décennies de plus que les humains.

bbf62461-4af4-4631-807a-eb0bd988d9a6.Name: IGNORE_DANGEROUS_SURFACES
bbf62461-4af4-4631-807a-eb0bd988d9a6.Description: Characters with this tag will not try and move out of dangerous surfaces. Be careful with this tag!

bd3cfefd-5fe2-47ea-bd3c-e99eaad9b714.Name: ENTERTAINER
bd3cfefd-5fe2-47ea-bd3c-e99eaad9b714.Description: |You know how to entrance, entertain, and inspire an audience. Your art is your life.|
bd3cfefd-5fe2-47ea-bd3c-e99eaad9b714.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: To live is to perform, and entertainers know that best. Hard-earned skill with acrobatics and instruments is key when appealing to the masses.
bd3cfefd-5fe2-47ea-bd3c-e99eaad9b714.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Le monde est un théâtre, la vie une comédie, et les artistes l'ont bien compris. Les compétences acrobatiques et musicales acquises à force d'entraînement sont leurs meilleurs atouts pour séduire les foules.

bd987761-1952-4942-85f1-d4538042aff3.Name: PALADIN_ILMATER
bd987761-1952-4942-85f1-d4538042aff3.Description: Player or NPC is a paladin of Ilmater.
bd987761-1952-4942-85f1-d4538042aff3.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Ilmater is the god of suffering and endurance. His paladins are martyrs in the truest sense, taking on the burdens of the oppressed until their last breath.
bd987761-1952-4942-85f1-d4538042aff3.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Ilmater est le dieu de la souffrance et de l'endurance. Ses paladins sont d'authentiques martyrs prêts à reprendre à leur compte les fardeaux des opprimés, et ce jusqu'à leur dernier souffle.

bde69893-ee8d-4327-aa58-075e40ce1e05.Name: COMBATPORTAL
bde69893-ee8d-4327-aa58-075e40ce1e05.Description: Specifies which portals or teleporters the NPCs can use during COMBAT.

be87fe94-657b-49fd-bec5-1348119018c7.Name: CIVIL_RACE
be87fe94-657b-49fd-bec5-1348119018c7.Description: Tag that make to logic about Playable Races

c070d771-944d-474b-b594-3786d545521e.Name: ACT1_DEN_CHARMEDKID
c070d771-944d-474b-b594-3786d545521e.Description: | Status tag for the Harpy Meal charmed halfling |

c1ff8a7f-c430-4671-bc4e-098f874ae302.Name: ALIGN_NEUTRAL
c1ff8a7f-c430-4671-bc4e-098f874ae302.Description: Tag used on God UUID objects to define their alignment. Don't change its name

c3fd1fc3-2edf-4d17-935d-44ab92406df1.Name: ASMODEUSTIEFLING
c3fd1fc3-2edf-4d17-935d-44ab92406df1.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Bound to Nessus, the deepest layer of the Hells, these tieflings inherit the ability to wield fire and darkness from the archdevil Asmodeus' infernal bloodline.
c3fd1fc3-2edf-4d17-935d-44ab92406df1.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Liés à Nessus, le Neuvième Enfer, ces tieffelins ont hérité la maîtrise du feu et des ténèbres d'Asmodée, l'archidiable qui est à l'origine de leur lignée.

c4749983-8bb9-4aa5-bf18-afd9cb1ce915.Name: CLERIC_EILISTRAEE
c4749983-8bb9-4aa5-bf18-afd9cb1ce915.Description: Player is a cleric of EIlistraee.
c4749983-8bb9-4aa5-bf18-afd9cb1ce915.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Eilistraee is the drow goddess of song, beauty, swordwork, hunting, and moonlight. As the patron of drow who reject the evils of their society, she instructs her clerics to offer light and hope.
c4749983-8bb9-4aa5-bf18-afd9cb1ce915.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Eilistraée est la déesse drow de la musique, de la beauté, de l'escrime, de la chasse et du clair de lune. Sainte patronne des drows qui rejettent les dérives maléfiques de leur société, elle compte sur ses clercs pour dispenser la lumière et l'espoir.

c61c8907-8f50-46ab-9bdb-6fde97913a39.Name: VFX_KNOCK_MEDIUM
c61c8907-8f50-46ab-9bdb-6fde97913a39.Description: Knock spell VFX for medium objects

c70e1dc2-72d4-44f9-83fd-c63d247edd9b.Name: REALLY_MEPHISTOPHELESTIEFLING
c70e1dc2-72d4-44f9-83fd-c63d247edd9b.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Descended from the archdevil Mephistopheles, these tieflings are gifted with a particular affinity for arcane magic.
c70e1dc2-72d4-44f9-83fd-c63d247edd9b.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Descendants directs de l'archidiable Méphistophélès, ces tieffelins ont une affinité particulière pour la magie profane.

c71eb8de-74e3-4d70-9826-22da7e2dc607.Name: REALLY_LOLTHDROWELF
c71eb8de-74e3-4d70-9826-22da7e2dc607.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Raised in one of Lolth's massive cults spread throughout the Underdark, these drow extol the virtues of their corrupt and merciless goddess, seeking to bring all other drow under her sway. Lolth marks her followers with vivid red eyes, in hope every race in Faerûn will learn to fear the very sight of them.
c71eb8de-74e3-4d70-9826-22da7e2dc607.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Élevés dans l'un des immenses cultes rendus à Lolth, omniprésents dans les Tréfonds Obscurs, ces drows chantent les vertus de leur déesse cruelle et corrompue afin de réunir tous leurs congénères sous sa bannière. Lolth marque ses disciples en leur donnant des yeux rouge vif afin que leur seule apparence sème la terreur parmi toutes les races de Faerûn.

c771a524-58fe-43e4-b8f0-b976e1b92d9f.Name: PALADIN_YONDALLA
c771a524-58fe-43e4-b8f0-b976e1b92d9f.Description: Player or NPC is a paladin of Yondalla.
c771a524-58fe-43e4-b8f0-b976e1b92d9f.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Yondalla is the mother-goddess of the halflings. Following her example, her paladins devote their lives to protecting their communities.
c771a524-58fe-43e4-b8f0-b976e1b92d9f.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Yondalla est la déesse mère des halfelins. Fidèles à ses enseignements, ses paladins consacrent leur vie à la protection de leurs communautés.

c7bdcdf2-15e7-456e-adf1-21dda3172e18.Name: OATHBREAKER
c7bdcdf2-15e7-456e-adf1-21dda3172e18.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: You have broken your sacred Oaths in pursuit of power and ambition. Only darkness remains to fuel you now.
c7bdcdf2-15e7-456e-adf1-21dda3172e18.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Vous avez renié vos serments sacrés dans votre quête de pouvoir et d'ambition. Il n'y a plus que les ténèbres en vous, désormais.

ca4e5850-139e-4b52-9d5e-553e33ff082a.Name: CLERIC_CORELLONLARETHIAN
ca4e5850-139e-4b52-9d5e-553e33ff082a.Description: Player or NPC is cleric of Corellon Larethian.
ca4e5850-139e-4b52-9d5e-553e33ff082a.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Corellon Larethian, ever-changing creator of all elves, is both chaos and beauty personified. Their clerics are self-reliant and find a connection to their god by truly getting to know themselves.
ca4e5850-139e-4b52-9d5e-553e33ff082a.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Créateur aux apparences multiples de tous les elfes, Corellon Larethian incarne à la fois la beauté et le chaos. Autonomes et débrouillards, les membres de son clergé communient avec leur dieu en apprenant à se connaître eux-mêmes.

cd5365fe-990a-4855-b203-503203d8dd9e.Name: ALLOW_SPEAK_WITH_DEAD
cd5365fe-990a-4855-b203-503203d8dd9e.Description: |Allows SwD on entities normally wouldn't allow it.|

cdad1fc1-352b-4441-82f2-73d8433e42ea.Name: WARLOCK_GREAT_OLD_ONE
cdad1fc1-352b-4441-82f2-73d8433e42ea.Description: This warlock's patron is a Great Old One
cdad1fc1-352b-4441-82f2-73d8433e42ea.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Your patron is a mysterious entity whose nature is utterly foreign to the fabric of reality.
cdad1fc1-352b-4441-82f2-73d8433e42ea.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Votre protecteur est une entité mystérieuse dont la nature même est fondamentalement étrangère à cette réalité.

cf60d691-4307-4a8c-af4d-0e8781ea2503.Name: IGNORE_PLATFORM_DESTRUCTION
cf60d691-4307-4a8c-af4d-0e8781ea2503.Description: Items with this tag will not be destroyed when they are on a platform and the platform is destroyed

cf6225be-c617-420f-96bc-3da63143aa15.Name: RECORD_ANTAGONIST
cf6225be-c617-420f-96bc-3da63143aa15.Description: This character is a major Antagonist in the story. For Voice Recording Team only.

d135f265-c2e1-4077-a836-b548ee871681.Name: SOLDIER
d135f265-c2e1-4077-a836-b548ee871681.Description: |War has been your life for as long as you care to remember. You trained as a youth, studied the use of weapons and armor, learned basic survival techniques, including how to stay alive on the battlefield.|
d135f265-c2e1-4077-a836-b548ee871681.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Formally trained in a militia or army, soldiers know tactics and combat like the back of their hand.
d135f265-c2e1-4077-a836-b548ee871681.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Formés au sein d'une milice ou d'une armée, les soldats connaissent l'art du combat et de la stratégie sous toutes les coutures.

d274b482-4add-4f36-a0a4-a94740f6630e.Name: OATHBREAKER_DEVOTION
d274b482-4add-4f36-a0a4-a94740f6630e.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Your previous oath was of the Devotion.
d274b482-4add-4f36-a0a4-a94740f6630e.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Vous aviez autrefois juré de respecter le serment de dévotion.

d2d60a81-688e-4d3d-ba56-3e467cae37fc.Name: REALLY_SELDARINEDROWELF
d2d60a81-688e-4d3d-ba56-3e467cae37fc.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Survivors of Lolth's treachery against Corellon Larethian, Seldarine drow live in a scattered collection of Underdark city-states, warring with each other as often as the Spider Queen's cult. Many of these drow travel to the surface in search of aid, seeking to reunite their shattered people at any cost.
d2d60a81-688e-4d3d-ba56-3e467cae37fc.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Survivants de la traîtrise de Lolth contre Corellon Larethian, les drows de la Seldarine vivent dans plusieurs cités-États des Tréfonds Obscurs, qui passent autant de temps à s'affronter entre elles qu'à lutter contre le culte de la Reine des Araignées. Nombre de ces drows se rendent à la surface pour y trouver de l'aide, cherchant à réunir leur peuple éclaté quel qu'en soit le prix.

d2f86ec3-c41f-47e1-8acd-984872a4d7d5.Name: RARE
d2f86ec3-c41f-47e1-8acd-984872a4d7d5.Description: Race group (aasimar, dragonborn, firbolg, genasi, githyanki, half-drow, half-orc, tiefling, triton, warforged, yuan-ti pureblood)

d81df6f9-9f6e-4146-841a-9f285e6ee879.Name: OUTLANDER
d81df6f9-9f6e-4146-841a-9f285e6ee879.Description: |The wilds are in your blood, whether you were a nomad, an explorer, a recluse, a hunter-gatherer, or even a marauder. Even in places where you don't know the specific features of the terrain, you know the ways of the wild.|
d81df6f9-9f6e-4146-841a-9f285e6ee879.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Raised in one of the distant and hostile regions of Faerûn, an outlander can survive in the outdoors with very little.
d81df6f9-9f6e-4146-841a-9f285e6ee879.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Originaire des confins hostiles de Faerûn, le sauvageon peut survivre en pleine nature avec très peu de choses.

d84a8a0b-b648-464c-9bd5-1ed9b965da2a.Name: OATHBREAKER_ANCIENTS
d84a8a0b-b648-464c-9bd5-1ed9b965da2a.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Your previous oath was one of Ancients.
d84a8a0b-b648-464c-9bd5-1ed9b965da2a.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Vous aviez autrefois juré de respecter le serment des anciens.

d93434bd-6b71-4789-b128-ee24156057cc.Name: BARD
d93434bd-6b71-4789-b128-ee24156057cc.Description: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation.
d93434bd-6b71-4789-b128-ee24156057cc.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Cleaving arcane magic to musical artistry, bards are performers without compare. They draw on songs empowered by spells, inspiring their allies and toppling their enemies.
d93434bd-6b71-4789-b128-ee24156057cc.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Associant musique et magie profane, les bardes sont des artistes incomparables. Ils mettent leurs sorts au service de leur chant afin d'inspirer leurs alliés et de déstabiliser leurs ennemis.

d9793375-20f0-437f-8033-011014b0b9ca.Name: NO_PATHFINDING_PORTAL
d9793375-20f0-437f-8033-011014b0b9ca.Description: Used to indicate that a portal should not be used for pathfinding, but needs to be used explicitely.

da1d4f47-8583-49a1-b262-d77d361b2e09.Name: REALLY_LIGHTFOOTHALFLING
da1d4f47-8583-49a1-b262-d77d361b2e09.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Named for their inclination to stealth, lightfoot halflings are nonetheless happy in the spotlight. They enjoy travel, and many have made names for themselves across Faerûn.
da1d4f47-8583-49a1-b262-d77d361b2e09.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Les halfelins pieds-légers doivent leur nom à leur discrétion naturelle. Pour autant, ces voyageurs infatigables s'épanouissent aussi bien au grand jour et bon nombre d'entre eux se sont fait un nom à Faerûn.

da25a7cc-066d-43dc-8f1e-74c17cd0d589.Name: CLERIC_TALOS
da25a7cc-066d-43dc-8f1e-74c17cd0d589.Description: Player or NPC is cleric of Talos.
da25a7cc-066d-43dc-8f1e-74c17cd0d589.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Eryn, A servant of Talos, God of Storms
da25a7cc-066d-43dc-8f1e-74c17cd0d589.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Éryn, servante de Talos, dieu des Tempêtes

dad18490-c61d-4958-805c-f017eb68f8a0.Name: SAGE
dad18490-c61d-4958-805c-f017eb68f8a0.Description: |You spent years learning the lore of the multiverse. You scoured manuscripts, studied scrolls, and listened to the greatest experts on the subjects that interest you. Your efforts have made you a master in your fields of study.|
dad18490-c61d-4958-805c-f017eb68f8a0.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Well-read and vigorous studies, sages always seek knowledge, often trading their own expertise for that of others.
dad18490-c61d-4958-805c-f017eb68f8a0.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Cultivés et enthousiastes, les sages sont en quête permanente d'un savoir supérieur et partagent volontiers leurs propres connaissances en échange des enseignements qu'on peut leur apporter.

dc005135-7eee-4406-a46e-9535e7412422.Name: CLERIC_YONDALLA
dc005135-7eee-4406-a46e-9535e7412422.Description: Player or NPC is cleric of Yondalla.
dc005135-7eee-4406-a46e-9535e7412422.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Yondalla is the mother-goddess of the halflings. Her clerics view her as a strong and protective parent who bestows them with luck, and whose example should be followed.
dc005135-7eee-4406-a46e-9535e7412422.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Yondalla est la déesse tutélaire du panthéon halfelin. Les membres de son clergé la voient comme une mère forte et protectrice qui leur porte bonheur et dont il convient de suivre l'exemple.

df697d73-5469-405a-aa95-6e1e720c5ee6.Name: REALLY_ROCKGNOME
df697d73-5469-405a-aa95-6e1e720c5ee6.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Rock gnomes are the most common to see on Faerûn's surface, named as such for their hardiness and affinity for metal.
df697d73-5469-405a-aa95-6e1e720c5ee6.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Les gnomes des roches sont l'espèce de gnomes la plus commune à la surface de Faerûn. Ils doivent leur nom à leur robustesse naturelle et à leur affinité avec le règne minéral.

e0a85c7e-09d4-4395-948a-4ee272ad1953.Name: DISABLE_WEAPON_EFFECTS
e0a85c7e-09d4-4395-948a-4ee272ad1953.Description: Disables weapon effects on the tagged weapon

e10d0262-f1fe-425d-9e45-8bff373731d7.Name: DO_NOT_TRANSLATE
e10d0262-f1fe-425d-9e45-8bff373731d7.Description: Used to remove tagged node from loca translation - used for nodes featuring only string vars

e19f68ed-0c16-425e-92d3-3fbd5d3c58a0.Name: CANBEBLINDED
e19f68ed-0c16-425e-92d3-3fbd5d3c58a0.Description: Marks an item to be able to be BLINDED.

e1e460bb-d0ae-4452-8529-c9e176558731.Name: MONK
e1e460bb-d0ae-4452-8529-c9e176558731.Description: A master of martial arts, harnessing the power of the body in pursuit of physical and spiritual perfection.
e1e460bb-d0ae-4452-8529-c9e176558731.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Monks use discipline and ritual to harness the energy inside their bodies, transforming it into explosive power. They excel at unarmed combat, for their defence is as strong as their spirit.
e1e460bb-d0ae-4452-8529-c9e176558731.DisplayDescriptionFrench: C'est à grand renfort de discipline et de rituels que les moines apprennent à maîtriser leur énergie intrinsèque pour la transformer en puissance dévastatrice. Experts en combat à mains nues, ils se caractérisent par une force mentale et un art de la défense hors du commun.

e2db698a-0705-43f4-9674-06fff1fd1e67.Name: SHOVEL
e2db698a-0705-43f4-9674-06fff1fd1e67.Description: Tags items with which you can dig

e3a622d6-e9f3-4925-9650-7a3e6fefee6c.Name: CANBECALMED
e3a622d6-e9f3-4925-9650-7a3e6fefee6c.Description: Marks an item to be able to be CALMED.

e49c027c-6ec6-4158-9afb-8b59236d10fd.Name: REALLY_GITHYANKI
e49c027c-6ec6-4158-9afb-8b59236d10fd.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: With a ruthlessness borne from mind flayer enslavement, githyanki ride the Astral Sea atop red dragons, bringing their silver swords and psionic might to bear against any trace of the illithid menace.
e49c027c-6ec6-4158-9afb-8b59236d10fd.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Implacables, les githyankis sillonnent la Mer Astrale sur le dos de leurs dragons rouges, attaquant de leurs épées d'argent et de toute leur puissance psionique les illithids partout où ils les trouvent, pour se venger des milliers d'années d'esclavagisme que ceux-ci leur ont fait subir.

e56e4df0-a4d7-480b-b69f-573c988b2f37.Name: KNOCKBLOCK
e56e4df0-a4d7-480b-b69f-573c988b2f37.Description: Prevents the object from being a valid object for Knock if it's locked

e64a45b2-ba13-4097-a7f9-05f6c8bee312.Name: PALADIN_VLAAKITH
e64a45b2-ba13-4097-a7f9-05f6c8bee312.Description: Player or NPC is a paladin of Vlaakith.
e64a45b2-ba13-4097-a7f9-05f6c8bee312.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Vlaakith is the dread lich queen of the githyanki. Anointed in a dark ritual, her paladins are chosen warriors who obey her every command.
e64a45b2-ba13-4097-a7f9-05f6c8bee312.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Vlaakith est la redoutable reine-liche des githyankis. Consacrés au cours d'un rituel occulte, ses paladins sont des guerriers élus qui lui obéissent aveuglément.

eacd09eb-cddc-4902-8133-b9d1b2a7c5cb.Name: RESTRAINED_ADV
eacd09eb-cddc-4902-8133-b9d1b2a7c5cb.Description: Advantage on rolls against restrained statuses

eae44d86-3321-4a0a-811d-4fd8e48b5723.Name: VO_POSTPROCESS
eae44d86-3321-4a0a-811d-4fd8e48b5723.Description: a Tag that indicates that this character will need Voice Processing on thier voice

ec2ee51e-80de-42a2-9d34-a5c9aa75cf75.Name: REDCAP
ec2ee51e-80de-42a2-9d34-a5c9aa75cf75.Description: |Redcap tag used for spell targeting conditions|

ec5bea6b-26f1-4917-919c-375f67ac13d1.Name: MEPHISTOPHELESTIEFLING
ec5bea6b-26f1-4917-919c-375f67ac13d1.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Descended from the archdevil Mephistopheles, these tieflings are gifted with a particular affinity for arcane magic.
ec5bea6b-26f1-4917-919c-375f67ac13d1.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Descendants directs de l'archidiable Méphistophélès, ces tieffelins ont une affinité particulière pour la magie profane.

edc085f7-63f8-4bb0-b60c-b68c92b67708.Name: CLERIC_TYMORA
edc085f7-63f8-4bb0-b60c-b68c92b67708.Description: Player or NPC is cleric of Tymora.
edc085f7-63f8-4bb0-b60c-b68c92b67708.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Kylin, A servant of Tymora, Goddess of Good Fortune
edc085f7-63f8-4bb0-b60c-b68c92b67708.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Kylin, serviteur de Tymora, déesse de la Chance

ef5d1184-dd1c-4988-bef9-ad19471aadba.Name: AI_THROWITEM
ef5d1184-dd1c-4988-bef9-ad19471aadba.Description: Tag used for AI to find objects in their environment to use with the Throw spell.

ef9c5b74-56a8-48cc-b0b9-169ee16bf026.Name: LOLTHDROWELF
ef9c5b74-56a8-48cc-b0b9-169ee16bf026.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Raised in one of Lolth's massive cults spread throughout the Underdark, these drow extol the virtues of their corrupt and merciless goddess, seeking to bring all other drow under her sway. Lolth marks her followers with vivid red eyes, in hope every race in Faerûn will learn to fear the very sight of them.
ef9c5b74-56a8-48cc-b0b9-169ee16bf026.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Élevés dans l'un des immenses cultes rendus à Lolth, omniprésents dans les Tréfonds Obscurs, ces drows chantent les vertus de leur déesse cruelle et corrompue afin de réunir tous leurs congénères sous sa bannière. Lolth marque ses disciples en leur donnant des yeux rouge vif afin que leur seule apparence sème la terreur parmi toutes les races de Faerûn.

f0020818-86f1-4ee9-a5a9-9ace9ecc9010.Name: DEFEATED
f0020818-86f1-4ee9-a5a9-9ace9ecc9010.Description: Set on defeated characters. Removed by script when defeated status gets cleared.

f5071dac-7a94-4302-a3e6-a631d0d53619.Name: SEPARATE_STACK_MERGING
f5071dac-7a94-4302-a3e6-a631d0d53619.Description: |Can be set on items to prevent them from getting merged with other items that are otherwise the same (unless they also have this tag, so be careful). Use for shop triggers: when selecting an item, it gets temporarily added to the trader's inventory. It shouldn't be merged with other items of the same kind, so we can place it back if the player doesn't buy it.|

f532d904-4e7c-469f-8e47-67a639cd1ae1.Name: AI_USEITEM_A
f532d904-4e7c-469f-8e47-67a639cd1ae1.Description: Combat AI tag used for use objects

f639a9df-1adc-4897-b540-0a74b2bb5c2e.Name: PALADIN_OGHMA
f639a9df-1adc-4897-b540-0a74b2bb5c2e.Description: Player or NPC is a paladin of Oghma.
f639a9df-1adc-4897-b540-0a74b2bb5c2e.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Oghma is the god of knowledge. His paladins go on dangerous quests to restore lost lore, and put their lives on the line to protect strongholds of knowledge like Oghma's libraries.
f639a9df-1adc-4897-b540-0a74b2bb5c2e.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Oghma est le dieu de la connaissance. Ses paladins bravent tous les dangers pour exhumer le savoir perdu et protègent les bastions de l'érudition, telles les bibliothèques d'Oghma, au péril de leur vie.

f6662b6e-b3bf-468e-82cb-402247176a1b.Name: VAMPIRE
f6662b6e-b3bf-468e-82cb-402247176a1b.Description: Used for both Vampires and Vampire spawn.

f6d0e042-5b90-41d8-ab4a-a2239e27a13e.Name: SORCERER_DRACONIC
f6d0e042-5b90-41d8-ab4a-a2239e27a13e.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: This sorcerer's veins carry draconic magic, the result of a powerful dragon ancestor.
f6d0e042-5b90-41d8-ab4a-a2239e27a13e.DisplayDescriptionFrench: La puissance de la magie draconique court dans les veines de cet ensorceleur. Ce dernier la tient de l'un de ses lointains ancêtres, qui n'était autre qu'un dragon.

f6dfdd47-bbf1-4419-b4b9-7a1e67a197da.Name: PALADIN_SELUNE
f6dfdd47-bbf1-4419-b4b9-7a1e67a197da.Description: Player or NPC is a paladin of Selune.
f6dfdd47-bbf1-4419-b4b9-7a1e67a197da.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Selûne is the goddess of the moon, and her paladins are soldiers in the constant war against her dark sister Shar. They use her light to dispel darkness and relieve the pain of others.
f6dfdd47-bbf1-4419-b4b9-7a1e67a197da.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Séluné est la déesse de la lune et ses paladins lui servent de soldats dans la guerre éternelle qui l'oppose à sa sœur maléfique, Shar. Ils utilisent sa lumière divine pour dissiper les ténèbres et soulager les souffrances de leurs prochains.

f791b866-0cc4-48e9-ba4b-80d356a49387.Name: VFX_BLOOD_GREEN
f791b866-0cc4-48e9-ba4b-80d356a49387.Description: Tag to identify creatures with Green blood for VFX

f8a0608b-666c-4be6-a49c-03b369c10bd2.Name: ROGUE
f8a0608b-666c-4be6-a49c-03b369c10bd2.Description: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies.
f8a0608b-666c-4be6-a49c-03b369c10bd2.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: With stealth, skill, and uncanny reflexes, rogues' versatility lets them get the upper hand in almost any situation.
f8a0608b-666c-4be6-a49c-03b369c10bd2.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Aussi talentueux qu'insaisissable, le roublard est un acrobate ingénieux et polyvalent qui a un don pour sortir indemne de n'importe quelle situation, ou presque.

f8fca7c4-c06b-4c2c-a9d4-43d959df51ec.Name: SHOPTRIGGER_BLOCK_FOR_SALE
f8fca7c4-c06b-4c2c-a9d4-43d959df51ec.Description: |Set on items in shop triggers that should not be for sale, even if their root is for sale by default (e.g. a personal heirloom or quest reward)|

fa8afea4-4742-4467-bdef-69851bd15878.Name: ARROW
fa8afea4-4742-4467-bdef-69851bd15878.Description: Special arrow, e.g. Arrow of Fire

fae436d4-da32-42a6-a2b2-9635da0b82eb.Name: MEAT
fae436d4-da32-42a6-a2b2-9635da0b82eb.Description: Checked by osi/behaviour for certain food type items

fb59fa11-9bd3-4af4-a81d-b5ad1882102e.Name: DEEP_WATER_CHASM
fb59fa11-9bd3-4af4-a81d-b5ad1882102e.Description: Tag to indicate that a chasm is "deep water" - see CHASM_IMMUNE_SWIM and CHASM_IMMUNE_FLY descriptions.

fbe3ee5d-1bb8-4c0b-a18c-26386101a680.Name: WARLOCK_FIEND
fbe3ee5d-1bb8-4c0b-a18c-26386101a680.Description: This warlock's patron is a Fiend
fbe3ee5d-1bb8-4c0b-a18c-26386101a680.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: You have made a pact with a fiend from the Lower Planes of existence, a being whose aims are evil, even if you strive against those aims.
fbe3ee5d-1bb8-4c0b-a18c-26386101a680.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Vous avez conclu un pacte avec un fiélon des plans inférieurs, bien que vous ne soyez pas d'accord avec ses ambitions maléfiques.

fe0d86c3-a562-430e-a633-d8bf9bb27284.Name: GRENADE
fe0d86c3-a562-430e-a633-d8bf9bb27284.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: The famed Blade of Frontiers, the pride of Baldur's Gate.
fe0d86c3-a562-430e-a633-d8bf9bb27284.DisplayDescriptionFrench: La célèbre Épée des Confins, fierté de la Porte de Baldur.

fe2e65d3-a8de-45bf-a372-c339adec669e.Name: BLOCK_PICKPOCKET
fe2e65d3-a8de-45bf-a372-c339adec669e.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: The famed Blade of Frontiers, the pride of Baldur's Gate.
fe2e65d3-a8de-45bf-a372-c339adec669e.DisplayDescriptionFrench: La célèbre Épée des Confins, fierté de la Porte de Baldur.

ff16e8ab-e8e6-4acb-a105-aae53a9d510e.Name: SUMMONWITHOUTMOUTH
ff16e8ab-e8e6-4acb-a105-aae53a9d510e.Description: Used to determine which summons can drink potions.

ff6d7d1f-094f-432e-a117-fdc3a0ab7ac1.Name: AI_IGNORED_TARGET
ff6d7d1f-094f-432e-a117-fdc3a0ab7ac1.Description: Tag characters that the Ai should completely ignore in the calculations.

02e5e9ed-b6b2-4524-99cd-cb2bc84c754a.Name: DRAGONBORN
02e5e9ed-b6b2-4524-99cd-cb2bc84c754a.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: While not true dragons themselves, draconic lineage defines the dragonborn. They inherit powerful breath weapons from their ancestors and possess a preternatural toughness.
02e5e9ed-b6b2-4524-99cd-cb2bc84c754a.DisplayDescriptionFrench: S'ils ne sont pas de véritables dragons, les drakéides se distinguent néanmoins par leur héritage draconique. Ils tiennent un souffle puissant de leurs ancêtres et bénéficient d'une robustesse surnaturelle.

0a79a905-d41f-401f-a0e4-a2401143fc17.Name: VFX_ASHPILE_MEDIUM
0a79a905-d41f-401f-a0e4-a2401143fc17.Description: |This creature will have a medium ash pile upon its death.|

0a9ff41b-d599-4d51-bfbc-2389475ec883.Name: VFX_ASHPILE_LARGE
0a9ff41b-d599-4d51-bfbc-2389475ec883.Description: |This creature will have a large ash pile on Disintegration Death|

1029b3e3-3ff0-4d73-b4ed-79b622cad4f9.Name: REALLY_BESTIAL
1029b3e3-3ff0-4d73-b4ed-79b622cad4f9.Description: Race group for REALLY_ races (aarakocra, kenku, lizardfolk, tabaxi, tortle)

13a8385d-d502-496a-8b91-f6d9a8e7a2cb.Name: SCRATCH
13a8385d-d502-496a-8b91-f6d9a8e7a2cb.Description: |Tag for scratch to find things in the world.|

1b1a83c5-4fc9-488f-b4ed-0fcf844b1f5c.Name: HIT_PROXY
1b1a83c5-4fc9-488f-b4ed-0fcf844b1f5c.Description: Tag used to identify hit box proxy helper characters

1ff4bf9e-a8dd-4627-8142-f60b3aa7123e.Name: YUANTIPUREBLOOD
1ff4bf9e-a8dd-4627-8142-f60b3aa7123e.Description: Character looks like a yuan-ti pureblood

28b5d96a-bbfb-433f-9cd4-bdff98eae252.Name: PALADIN_BAHAMUT
28b5d96a-bbfb-433f-9cd4-bdff98eae252.Description: |Player or NPC is a paladin of Bahamut.|
28b5d96a-bbfb-433f-9cd4-bdff98eae252.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: A servant of Bahamut, God of metallic dragons.
28b5d96a-bbfb-433f-9cd4-bdff98eae252.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Un serviteur de Bahamut, dieu des dragons métalliques.

28ee4ac1-86a3-490e-ab02-7085bd7c56d6.Name: CLERIC_BAHAMUT
28ee4ac1-86a3-490e-ab02-7085bd7c56d6.Description: Player or NPC is cleric of Bane.
28ee4ac1-86a3-490e-ab02-7085bd7c56d6.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: A servant of Bahamut, god of metallic dragons.
28ee4ac1-86a3-490e-ab02-7085bd7c56d6.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Une servante de Bahamut, dieu des dragons métalliques.

3311a9a9-cdbc-4b05-9bf6-e02ba1fc72a3.Name: HALFORC
3311a9a9-cdbc-4b05-9bf6-e02ba1fc72a3.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Although they descend from cultures of strength and martial prowess, most half-orcs are born in times of peace. Whenever orcish wars end, alliances and marriages lead to a new generation of shared blood.
3311a9a9-cdbc-4b05-9bf6-e02ba1fc72a3.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Descendants de civilisations placées sous le signe de la force et des prouesses martiales, la plupart des demi-orques sont toutefois nés en temps de paix. Chaque fois qu'une guerre impliquant des orques prend fin, les alliances et autres mariages mixtes qui s'ensuivent donnent naissance à une nouvelle génération de sang-mêlé.

37ad267f-7295-4c1e-9ca4-769c8c06441d.Name: DIVINE_INTERVENTION_USED
37ad267f-7295-4c1e-9ca4-769c8c06441d.Description: A tag to identify if a character has already used Divine Intervention. This makes sure the spell cannot be re-added.

39783f17-8484-46a6-aa3b-f3d51122e5f3.Name: REALLY_DRAGONBORN

8c0c7811-d944-4780-8e62-96f0911819e5.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: When a feckless amateur spellcaster attempts to create life, and bungles it, the result is a Gremishka. Spiteful, malformed, and hideously feline, Gremishka's hold a particular loathing for practitioners of the arcane arts, a dark reflection of typical parental love.
8c0c7811-d944-4780-8e62-96f0911819e5.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Quand un lanceur de sorts inepte tente de créer la vie et rate son coup, il en résulte souvent un gremishka. Cette créature vaguement féline difforme et pleine de rancœur hait tout particulièrement les pratiquants des arts mystiques, tel un enfant perturbé voulant se venger de ses parents.

90d7fbd5-1264-4bd6-93ba-67c2116e6ab0.Name: WIZARD_NECROMANCY

a1aa47b2-4d0a-4c97-931b-2c53353d5b23.DisplayDescriptionFrench: N'hésitant pas à renier votre propre pureté s'il le faut, vous rendez la justice face à ceux qui ont commis les pires péchés.

ab3eff19-d094-4102-88bd-d097b6b6e4f0.Name: REALLY_HALFORC
ab3eff19-d094-4102-88bd-d097b6b6e4f0.DisplayDescriptionEnglish: Although they descend from cultures of strength and martial prowess, most half-orcs are born in times of peace. Whenever orcish wars end, alliances and marriages lead to a new generation of shared blood.
ab3eff19-d094-4102-88bd-d097b6b6e4f0.DisplayDescriptionFrench: Descendants de civilisations placées sous le signe de la force et des prouesses martiales, la plupart des demi-orques sont toutefois nés en temps de paix. Chaque fois qu'une guerre impliquant des orques prend fin, les alliances et autres mariages mixtes qui s'ensuivent donnent naissance à une nouvelle génération de sang-mêlé.
